subtask.title: Explore AI Platforms (AWS, Azure, etc.)
subtask.objective: Familiarize with AI services offered by cloud providers suitable for sysadmin automation tasks.
subtask.scope: Review documentation, tutorials, and introductory guides for AWS AI, Azure AI, and similar platforms.

verification.completion_summary: The research has gathered relevant examples and insights into cloud-based AI services and applications, notably in conversational AI and real-time communication. However, it primarily focuses on specific use cases rather than comprehensive documentation review.

covered_aspects: familiarity with AI services like GPT, Twilio, Google Cloud
missing_aspects: detailed review of documentation, tutorials, and introductory guides for AWS AI and Azure AI
comparison of AI platform features and suitability for sysadmin automation tasks

missing_requirements: comprehensive documentation review for AWS AI and Azure AI
specific focus on AI services applicable for sysadmin automation tasks
